content:
/>
IX.i.3.A.1.d
.
Applicability of Net Worth to Pension and Parents’ DIC Claims
In claims that involve
Section 306 Pension or current-law pension, net worth
is
a factor, and
Old-Law Pension or Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC), net worth
is not
a factor.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Information on Income and Net Worth Development
citation: Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
